entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: W 46 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
